text: @MSNBC Misleading citizens from the onset. COVID-19 didn't magically disappear. Injecting disinfectant was no joke. Trump not wearing a mask at a factory resulted in those supplies being thrown away.  The US ranks 9th in handling the pandemic and testing. 9th!
